id.description: The unique identifier of the registration.

name.description: The username of the new user account.

primaryEmail.description: The primary e-mail of the new user account.

name.description: The unique identifier of the organization used in URLs.

displayName.description: The name of the organization as displayed in the UI. If not set, it defaults to the "name" property.

public.description: Whether the organization should be public. Anyone can see the dashboard, projects and reports of a public organization, but you still need to be a member to publish new test results.

completed.description: Indicates whether the user has validated his e-mail address and completed the registration process.

completedAt.description: The date at which the registration was completed. This is only available once the user has completed the registration process.

expiresAt.description: The date at which the validity of the link sent in the registration e-mail will expire. This is only available when the registration has been created but not yet completed.

createdAt.description: The date at which the registration was created.
